sentence.Network_en: Remember, stick to the issues and don't take it personally.
sentence.Network_cn: 记住，就事论事，不要把问题个人化。

sentence.Network_en: He didn't just command. He personally fought in several heavy battles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不仅仅发号施令，还身先士卒参加了几次激战。

sentence.Network_en: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

jx.jx_en_mean: interpret a remark or action as directed against oneself and be upset or offended by it, even if that was not the speaker's intention

lj.lj_ly: at first I took it personally when he yelled at me.
lj.lj_ls: 起初我还以为他对我吼叫是冲着我来的。

entry.def: You use personally to emphasize that you are giving your own opinion.

example.ex: Personally I think it's a waste of time...
example.tran: 在我看来，这是浪费时间。

example.ex: You can disagree about them, and I personally do, but they are great ideas that have made people think...
example.tran: 你可以不同意这些看法，我个人也不同意。但它们的确是引发人们思考的好想法。

entry.def: If you do something personally, you do it yourself rather than letting someone else do it.

example.ex: The minister is returning to Paris to answer the allegations personally...
example.tran: 部长将返回巴黎亲自回应那些指控。

example.ex: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs...
example.tran: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

entry.def: If you meet or know someone personally, you meet or know them in real life, rather than knowing about them or knowing their work.

example.ex: He did not know them personally, but he was familiar with their reputation...
example.tran: 他并不认识他们，但已久仰他们的大名。

example.ex: I have orders to deliver it to Mr Demiris personally...
example.tran: 我奉命要把它送给德米里斯先生本人。

entry.def: You can use personally to say that something refers to an individual person rather than to other people.

example.ex: He was personally responsible for all that the people had suffered under his rule...
example.tran: 他个人要为他统治时人民所受的所有苦难负责。

example.ex: In order for me to spend three months on something it has to interest me personally.
example.tran: 要让我在某件事情上花3个月时间,这件事必须得让我感兴趣。

entry.def: You can use personally to show that you are talking about someone's private life rather than their professional or public life.

example.ex: This has taken a great toll on me personally and professionally...
example.tran: 这给我的个人生活和我的工作都造成了严重的不良影响。

example.ex: Personally he was quiet, modest and unobtrusive...
example.tran: 私下里他文静、谦虚、不事张扬。

entry.def: If you take someone's remarks personally, you are upset because you think that they are criticizing you in particular.

example.tran: 我太主观了，认为一切都是针对我的。

example.ex: Remember, stick to the issues and don't take it personally.
example.tran: 记住,就事论事,不要把问题个人化。

sentences.sentence: "speaking personally, I would not want to go"

means.word_mean: 4. in the flesh; without involving anyone else;

auth_sentence.content: I personally think that's a rather good idea.
auth_sentence.res_content: I personally think that's a rather good idea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I personally think that's a rather good idea.

auth_sentence.content: Personally I would like to see it again sometime.
auth_sentence.res_content: Personally I would like to see it again sometime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Personally I would like to see it again sometime.

auth_sentence.content: Personally, I think the grid needs to go.
auth_sentence.res_content: Personally, I think the grid needs to go.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Personally, I think the grid needs to go.

Sentence.sentence: But to come back to this one, I personally didn't think it was very good
Personally I can't quite see the meaning in his modern works.

In contrast to each of these ideas, Covey advocates that leaders need to understand universal principles of effectiveness, and he highlights how vital it is for leaders to first personally manage themselves if they are to enjoy any hope of outstanding success in their work environments.

sentences.en: The owner of the hotel welcomed us personally.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆的主人亲自欢迎我们。

means.word_mean: 就个人而言；就个人意见

sentences.en: Personally, I think he is a very good man, but you may not agree.
sentences.cn: 就个人而言, 我认为他是个很好的人, 但你也许不同意。

sentences.en: I like him personally, but I hate what he believes in.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他这个人, 但我讨厌他所信仰的东西。

means.word_mean: 认为某泛指的话针对自己而不悅

sentences.en: I was talking about people having smelly socks, and I’m afraid Mike took it personally.
sentences.cn: 我谈论那些袜子臭的人，恐怕迈克以为是说他，所以生气了。

sentences.en: Look, don’t take this personally, Sue, but there are several people in this office who are not working hard enough.
sentences.cn: 我没有针对你，苏，不过这个办公室里的确有几个人工作不够努力。
